name: small pixel
description:
Small pixels are a sandbox game.
You will play a survivor inside,
*food:
First you have to dig the grass to get the seeds, then make a hoe,
cultivate the land and grow the crop,making a bucket of water， get the food,
There are many ways to get food, such as digging leaves, getting apples, and getting rid of mud in underwater water.
You can also put it in the soil for a while and he will breed next to it (must have water on it)

*Start to see the production table

Yes, there will be a book after birth, right click on him, let you have a general understanding,


*production tools
Production tools can capture or destroy specific things faster, such as dice can dig dirt faster
In some cases, specific tools can collect specific items.

*Making large stoves
You will find that the stove has only one grid to burn, you need a large stove at this time.
Large furnaces need 8 stones around a circle, then put the stove in the middle, it can burn more things
It has not been possible in the Stone Age. To make metal, it is necessary to burn minerals.
At this time, you need a stone to make a simple blast furnace. The details will appear in the synthetic table.

* Discover more interesting things
You already have the basic skills to survive (at least you should not starve)
Let's explore
